subject: Order SSN2784
description_text:
Order SSN2784 — can you give me any updates? This is already the third
email I've sent you.
I

conversations.body_text: Hi Cristian Pezzotti,    We’re currently on the National Day holiday (October 1st–8th), so orders haven’t been processed during this period.  We’ll resume work on October 9th and ship your order as soon as possible.

Hi Cristian Pezzotti,    We’re currently on the National Day holiday (October 1st–8th), so orders haven’t been processed during this period.  We’ll resume work on October 9th and ship your order as soon as possible.
ID 为 4437 and 4493 的工单已被合并至该工单。

合并来自工单4437  
      主题: SSN2784 Notizie  
      描述:  Ciao mi potete dare informazioni sulla mia spedizione grazie rispondete grazie

合并来自工单4493  
      主题: Urgent: No Response Regarding Order SSN2784  
      描述:  
   
   
 Dear Simsonn Support Team, 
   
 I hope this message finds you well. I am writing to follow up on my order SSN2784, which I have already inquired about multiple times over the past week. This is now the fourth email I’ve sent, and I have yet to receive any response. 
   
 Could you please let me know where my order is and provide an update as soon as possible? I would appreciate a prompt reply, as the delay and lack of communication are becoming very frustrating. 
   
 Thank you for your attention to this matter. I look forward to hearing from you soon. 
   
 Best regard Cristian Pezzotti
ID 为 4320 的工单已合并到此工单。

合并来自工单4320  
      主题:   
      描述:  
 SSN2784 quando spedite ?

Thank you for the update. I completely understand the pause due to the
National Day holiday. I’ll wait patiently for operations to resume on
October 9th and for my order to be shipped.
Please feel free to reach out if there are any further updates.

Best regards,
Cristian Pezzotti
